On this page

Link ‚Äã

üåè Translated with the assistance of DeepSeek and ChatGPT

A component used to display hyperlinks.

Basic Usage ‚Äã

Usually, we use it just like an <a> tag.

_self_blank
<template>
	<div>
		<px-link href="./link" target="_self" style="margin-right: 16px">_self</px-link>
		<px-link href="./link" target="_blank">_blank</px-link>
	</div>
</template>

Link Themes ‚Äã

The link offers six themes: 'primary' (default), 'success', 'warning', 'danger', 'info', and 'sakura'.

PrimarySuccessWarningDangerInfoSakura
<template>
	<px-link style="margin-right: 8px">Primary</px-link>
	<px-link style="margin-right: 8px" theme="success">Success</px-link>
	<px-link style="margin-right: 8px" theme="warning">Warning</px-link>
	<px-link style="margin-right: 8px" theme="danger">Danger</px-link>
	<px-link style="margin-right: 8px" theme="info">Info</px-link>
	<px-link theme="sakura">Sakura</px-link>
</template>

Disabled Status ‚Äã

disabled indicates that the link is disabled; the browser‚Äôs default click-to-navigate behavior will not be triggered.

No Allow
<template>
	<px-link disabled>No Allow</px-link>
</template>

Loading Status ‚Äã

loading indicates whether the link is in a loading state; while loading, the browser‚Äôs default click-to-navigate behavior will not be triggered.

Loading
Loading
<template>
	<px-link style="margin-right: 8px" loading>Loading</px-link>
	<px-link loading disabled>Loading</px-link>
</template>
Icon 
<template>
	<px-link>
		<template #icon>
			<IconMinds></IconMinds>
		</template>
		Icon
	</px-link>
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">
import { IconMinds } from '@pixelium/web-vue/icon-hn/es'
</script>

Custom Color ‚Äã

Custom primary color: similar to the button component, the component will generate a complete color palette based on it, and this palette takes precedence over the preset palettes provided by theme. It supports CSS-like strings such as 'rgb(r, g, b)' and 'rgba(r, g, b, a)', as well as 3-, 4-, 6-, and 8-digit hexadecimal values.

#409EFF#FAE13C#E956AE#909399
<template>
	<px-link style="margin-right: 8px" color="#409EFF">#409EFF</px-link>
	<px-link style="margin-right: 8px" color="#FAE13C">#FAE13C</px-link>
	<px-link style="margin-right: 8px" color="#E956AE">#E956AE</px-link>
	<px-link color="#909399">#909399</px-link>
</template>

API ‚Äã

LinkProps ‚Äã

AttributeTypeOptionalDefaultDescriptionVersion
disabledbooleanTrueWhether the link is disabled.0.0.0-beta
loadingbooleanTrueWhether the link is in a loading state.0.0.0-beta
theme'primary' | 'sakura' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'danger' | 'info'True'primary'Link theme.0.0.0-beta
colorstringTrue0.0.0-beta
hrefstringTrueNative HTML <a> href attribute.0.0.0-beta
targetstringTrueNative HTML <a> target attribute.0.0.0-beta

LinkSlots ‚Äã

SlotParameterParameter TypeDescriptionVersion
defaultThe link's content.0.0.0-beta
iconThe link's icon.0.0.0-beta

LinkEvents ‚Äã

EventParameterParameter TypeDescriptionVersion
clickeMouseEvent0.0.0-beta
